TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Keyboard extends System.Object
public ref class Keyboard abstract sealed

summary.span: 代表鍵盤裝置。

span.span: Represents the keyboard device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供鍵盤相關事件、 方法和屬性，可提供鍵盤狀態的相關資訊。The class provides keyboard-related events, methods, and properties that provide information regarding the state of the keyboard. 每個事件，定義為附加的事件也會重新公開在基底類別所和做為新的路由事件。Each of the events that defines as an attached event is also re-exposed by the base element classes and as a new routed event. 一般而言，會在處理鍵盤事件的應用程式更方便並，而不是使用事件。Generally, it is more convenient to handle keyboard events for an application on and , rather than using the events. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 為了讓接收鍵盤輸入的項目，必須是可焦點化項目。In order for an element to receive keyboard input, the element must be focusable. 大部分衍生的物件是預設的可設定焦點。Most derived objects are focusable by default. 否則，若要讓項目可設定焦點，設定屬性的基底項目`true`。Otherwise, to make an element focusable, set the property on the base element to `true`. 如需有關基底元素的詳細資訊，請參閱[基底的項目概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。For more information on the base elements, see [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md). 類別，例如並，設定的預設值至`false`。 classes, such as and , set the default value of to `false`. 因此，對於這些物件，以取得鍵盤焦點必須設為`true`。Therefore, for these objects to obtain keyboard focus, must be set to `true`. 鍵盤焦點是指接收鍵盤輸入的物件。Keyboard focus refers to the object that is receiving keyboard input. 具有鍵盤焦點的項目具有設定為`true`。The element with keyboard focus has set to `true`. 可以有鍵盤焦點設在整個桌面只能有一個項目。There can be only one element with keyboard focus on the entire desktop. 邏輯焦點是指具有焦點的焦點範圍內的物件。Logical focus refers to the object within a focus scope that has focus. 如需有關焦點、 鍵盤焦點和邏輯焦點的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)並[焦點概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 靜態成員主要類別委派的呼叫的執行緒，因此不一定是安全執行緒。The static members of the class delegate to the primary of the calling thread, so they are not necessarily thread-safe. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，以判斷索引鍵是否為已切換狀態。The following example shows how to use the method to determine if a key is in the toggled state. 如果傳遞至是切換，變更按鈕的背景。If the passed to is toggled, the background of a button is changed. [!code-csharp[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardIsToggled](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keyeventargskeyboardistoggled)] [!code-vb[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardIsToggled](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keyeventargskeyboardistoggled)]

summary.span: 清除焦點。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果焦點是在 Win32 視窗中，WPF 會呼叫在還原焦點時就會關閉功能表上的方法。If focus is within a Win32 window, WPF calls the method on restoration of focus when a menu is closed. Win32 焦點時離開功能表模式，就會傳回至裝載的子系 HWND，且沒有任何項目 WPF 焦點。When leaving menu mode, Win32 focus is returned to the hosted child HWND, and no element has WPF focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要接收鍵盤輸入的項目，項目必須是可設定焦點。For an element to receive keyboard input, the element must be focusable. 若要將項目可設定焦點，將屬性的基底項目`true`。To make an element focusable, set the property on the base element to `true`. 如需有關基底元素的詳細資訊，請參閱[基底的項目概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。For more information on the base elements, see [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md). 類別，例如並，設定的預設值要`false`; 因此，若要取得鍵盤焦點，這些物件必須設為`true`。 classes, such as and , set the default value of to `false`; therefore, for these objects to obtain keyboard focus, must be set to `true`. 鍵盤焦點是指接收鍵盤輸入的物件。Keyboard focus refers to the object that is receiving keyboard input. 具有鍵盤焦點的項目具有設定為`true`。The element with keyboard focus has set to `true`. 可以有鍵盤焦點設在整個桌面只能有一個項目。There can be only one element with keyboard focus on the entire desktop. 邏輯焦點是指具有焦點的焦點範圍內的物件。Logical focus refers to the object within a focus scope that has focus. 如需有關焦點、 鍵盤焦點和邏輯焦點的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)並[焦點概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 具有鍵盤焦點的項目也會有邏輯焦點的項目所屬焦點範圍。An element with keyboard focus also has logical focus for the focus scope the element belongs to. 具有邏輯焦點的項目可能會或可能沒有鍵盤焦點。An element with logical focus may or may not have keyboard focus. ## Examples 下列範例所示設定鍵盤焦點的事件處理常式。The following example shows a event handler that sets keyboard focus on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 是位元欄位列舉型別。因此，就可以在多個狀態的索引鍵。 is a bit field enumeration; therefore, it is possible for a key to be in multiple states. 例如，索引鍵可能是處於已按下狀態以及如所示為已切換狀態。For example, a key could be in the pressed state as well as in the toggled state. 您可以使用位元比較作業來判斷的狀態的索引鍵的確切狀態。Use bit comparison operations to determine the exact state or states the key is in. 類別提供了一些靜態方法，而這些方法也可用來取得索引鍵的狀態資訊。The class provides a number of static methods which can also be used to obtain key state information. 方法是： ， ，和。The methods are: , , and . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來判斷的關鍵在於狀態。The following example shows how to use the method to determine if the key is in the state. 位元 AND 運算，用來比較傳回從而狀態。A bit AND operation is used to compare the returned from and the state. 如果機碼下的背景變更。If the key is down, the background of a is changed. [!code-csharp[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardGetKeyStates](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keyeventargskeyboardgetkeystates)] [!code-vb[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardGetKeyStates](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keyeventargskeyboardgetkeystates)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 將附加的事件實作為路由事件。implements attached events as routed events. 附加的事件基本上都[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]參考可以處理不會定義事件的物件的事件的語言概念的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]展開時也能周遊路由事件。Attached events are fundamentally a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept for referencing events that can be handled on objects that do not define that event, which [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] expands upon by also enabling the event to traverse a route. 附加的事件並沒有直接處理語法在程式碼若要附加的程式碼中的路由事件處理常式，您會使用指定的新增 \* 處理常式方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, you use a designated Add\*Handler method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 附加事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). 鍵盤焦點是指接收鍵盤輸入的物件。Keyboard focus refers to the object that is receiving keyboard input. 具有鍵盤焦點的項目具有設定為`true`。The element with keyboard focus has set to `true`. 可以有鍵盤焦點設在整個桌面只能有一個項目。There can be only one element with keyboard focus on the entire desktop. 邏輯焦點是指具有焦點的焦點範圍內的物件。Logical focus refers to the object within a focus scope that has focus. 如需有關焦點、 鍵盤焦點和邏輯焦點的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)並[焦點概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 如果事件或處理事件，並變更鍵盤焦點。If the event or the event is handled, keyboard focus does change. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . ## Examples 下列範例會建立，並將附加事件處理常式事件和事件。The following example creates a and attaches event handlers for the event and the event. 當取得鍵盤焦點，變更背景色彩和文字已清除。When the obtains keyboard focus, the background color is changed and the text of the is cleared. 當失去鍵盤焦點的背景色彩會變更，以及其重設在此範例中使用變數來呼叫的方法。When the loses keyboard focus, the background color is changed and a method is called which resets variables used in the sample. [!code-xml[keyboardsample#KeyboardSampleXAMLHandlerHookup](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyboardSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml#keyboardsamplexamlhandlerhookup)] [!code-csharp[keyboardsample#KeyboardSampleGotFocus](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyboardSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keyboardsamplegotfocus)] [!code-vb[keyboardsample#KeyboardSampleGotFocus](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyboardSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keyboardsamplegotfocus)] [!code-csharp[keyboardsample#KeyboardSampleLostFocus](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyboardSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keyboardsamplelostfocus)] [!code-vb[keyboardsample#KeyboardSampleLostFocus](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyboardSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keyboardsamplelostfocus)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是位元欄位列舉型別，因此很可能同時被按下的多個輔助按鍵。 is a bit field enumeration, so it is possible for multiple modifier keys to be pressed at the same time. 使用位元作業，來決定確切組的輔助按鍵按下。Use bit operations to determine the exact set of modifier keys pressed. ## Examples 下列範例會使用位元 AND 比較以判斷輔助按鍵。The following example uses a bit AND comparison to determine if the modifier key is pressed. [!code-csharp[keyargssnippetsample#KeyboardModifiersBitOperation](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keyboardmodifiersbitoperation)] [!code-vb[keyargssnippetsample#KeyboardModifiersBitOperation](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keyboardmodifiersbitoperation)]

summary.span: 當項目正在取得鍵盤焦點的處理序中發生。

span.span: Occurs when an element is in the process of acquiring keyboard focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 將附加的事件實作為路由事件。implements attached events as routed events. 附加的事件基本上都[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]參考可以處理不會定義事件的物件的事件的語言概念的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]展開時也能周遊路由事件。Attached events are fundamentally a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept for referencing events that can be handled on objects that do not define that event, which [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] expands upon by also enabling the event to traverse a route. 附加的事件並沒有直接處理語法在程式碼若要附加的程式碼中的路由事件處理常式，您會使用指定的新增 \* 處理常式方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, you use a designated Add\*Handler method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 附加事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). 如果事件或處理事件、 鍵盤焦點不會變更。If the event or the event is handled, keyboard focus does not change. 鍵盤焦點是指接收鍵盤輸入的物件。Keyboard focus refers to the object that is receiving keyboard input. 具有鍵盤焦點的項目具有設定為`true`。The element with keyboard focus has set to `true`. 可以有鍵盤焦點設在整個桌面只能有一個項目。There can be only one element with keyboard focus on the entire desktop. 邏輯焦點是指具有焦點的焦點範圍內的物件。Logical focus refers to the object within a focus scope that has focus. 如需有關焦點、 鍵盤焦點和邏輯焦點的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)並[焦點概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的事件反昇事件是。The corresponding bubbling event is .

Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewGotKeyboardFocusEvent As RoutedEvent

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由的事件，並將結果儲存為可註冊路由的事件的類別上的欄位時，會建立路由的事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event. 這些識別碼會包含識別的名稱、 擁有者類型、 處理常式的類型、 路由策略和公用程式方法新增擁有者的事件。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event. 您經常使用這些識別碼做為參數，事件系統的方法，來識別特定的路由的事件。You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.
